search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for HeyGen (heygen.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for HeyGen is: [https://www.heygen.com/pricing](https://www.heygen.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: HeyGen Pricing | Free & Paid Plans from $24/mo | HeyGen

extracted_content.content:
HeyGen Pricing | Free & Paid Plans from $24/mo | HeyGen
===============

Join weekly webinars in the community

[Register Now](https://community.heygen.com/public/events)

[![Image 2: heygen](https://www.heygen.com/images/heygen-logo.svg)](https://www.heygen.com/)

[Platform](https://www.heygen.com/pricing#)

#### PRODUCTS

[Video Avatars](https://www.heygen.com/avatars/ai-video-avatar)[Photo Avatars](https://www.heygen.com/avatars/ai-photo-avatar)[Generative Avatars](https://www.heygen.com/avatars/generative-avatar)[Avatar Looks](https://www.heygen.com/avatars/avatar-looks)[Video Translation](https://www.heygen.com/translate)[Localization](https://www.heygen.com/translate/language-localization)[Avatar Video](https://www.heygen.com/create-avatar-video)[Personalized Video](https://www.heygen.com/personalized-video)[Interactive Avatar](https://www.heygen.com/interactive-avatar)

#### FEATURES

[Stock Avatars](https://www.heygen.com/avatars/stock-avatars)[API](https://www.heygen.com/api)

#### INDUSTRY

[Sign up for free](https://app.heygen.com/signup)

Open main menu

Fastest Growing Product by G2

Flexible Plans Built for

Every Creator, Marketer, and Team


=============================================================

HeyGen powers 85,000+ businesses to create, scale, and collaborate on video content without a camera or crew and was named G2’s #1 Fastest Growing Product of 2025.

Pay MonthlyPay Yearly (Save 22%)

### Free

$0/mo

Start creating on HeyGen at no cost

[Get Started](https://app.heygen.com/signup)

Video Generation:

*   3 videos per month
*   Videos up to 3-mins
*   720p video export
*   Standard video processing

Features You’ll Love:

*   1 Custom Video Avatar
*   500+ Stock Video Avatars
*   30+ languages
*   Share & download videos

### Creator

$29/mo

Unlimited short-form videos for creators

[Get Started](https://app.heygen.com/signup)

Video Generation:

*   Unlimited videos
*   Videos up to 5-mins
*   1080p video export
*   Fast video processing

Everything in Free, plus:

*   1+ Custom Video Avatar
*   1+ Custom Interactive Avatar
*   700+ Stock Video Avatars
*   Voice cloning
*   175+ languages and dialects
*   Generate Looks
*   Look Packs
*   Watermark removal
*   Brand Kit

Most Popular

### Team

$39/seat/mo

Supercharge video creation (minimum 2 seats)

[Get Started](https://app.heygen.com/signup)

Video Generation:

*   Unlimited videos
*   Videos up to 30-mins
*   1080p video export
*   Faster video processing

Everything in Creator, plus:

*   1 Custom Video Avatar/ seat
*   1 Custom Interactive Avatar/ seat
*   Unlimited Photo Avatars
*   Translation Proofread
*   Invites & team management
*   Collaborative workspace
*   Pay as you grow
*   Scale your brand and centralize assets

### Enterprise

Let’s Talk

Studio-quality custom video creation

[Contact Sales](https://www.heygen.com/contact-us)

Video Generation:

*   Unlimited videos
*   No video duration max
*   4k video export
*   Fastest video processing

Everything in Team, plus:

*   Centrally manage roles and access
*   SAML/SSO
*   Enterprise-grade security & privacy
*   Commercial terms
*   Priority customer support
*   Dedicated customer success manager

[Explore Our API Pricing](https://www.heygen.com/api-pricing)
